items.text: The ScaleGestureDetector does all the work by analyzing the gesture data and reporting the final scale factor through the onScale() callback.
items.href: Pinch-to-zoom with multi-touch gestures In Android | by Trust Onyekwere | Quick Code | Medium

items.text: We get the actual scale factor by calling getScaleFactor() on ScaleGestureDetector .
items.href: Pinch-to-zoom with multi-touch gestures In Android | by Trust Onyekwere | Quick Code | Medium

items.text: We use an ImageView with the application icon(you can use any image of choice) to provide a visual representation of the scaling by setting the ImageView scale using the scale factor returned from ScaleGestureDetector .
